Articles.Content:
Everyone has failed at least once in KSP, we all started off as terrible players, we all have had a failed Mun landing, so what are your KSP sins? The fails you just don't want to tell? Have you gone to a planet, but not thought about how to return? Have you tried to use parachutes on a planet with no/little atmosphere? Have you started off building rockets with no knowledge of how to design them?

Whatever they are, share your sins here, you are not the only one who has any!

When I started playing KSP and did not use SAS or RCS at all, for a long long time, or even know what their uses were. It made the game a lot harder for me.

Edited July 5, 2016 by RedstoneWizard22
All of my fails were salvaged...

We already have a thread about this, so I invite everyone to continue the discussion there:

 

 

Thread closed.
